content: this design holds a special place in my heart because it was my very first amigurumi pattern it s crochet kitten s mascot miss selena k in crochet form doing what she loves best and this amigurumi doubles as a hook holder for mid-project breaks note the right paw this pattern is now offered as a free gift for subscribers to crochet kitten you can subscribe using the form at the bottom of my about page via the link above
